urls.title: Storm Christoph presents significant flood risk | Association of Drainage Authorities
urls.description: The Met Office are expecting persistent heavy rainfall (between 100mm and 200mm) across a large swathe of Britain over the coming days. The Environment Agency anticipate flooding from Tuesday 19 January to parts of northern England and then northern, central and eastern England on Wednesday 20 and Thursday 21 January, with minor flood impacts possible [‚Ä¶]
